import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import ScrollAnimation from "react-animate-on-scroll"; const AdminCards = ({ column, teamStyle }) => { return (
{/* Магазинэ */}
{/* HeaderBanner */}
{/* Ажил */}
{/* Highlights */}
{/* Another highlights */}
{/* Special */}
{/* Marketing SUBS */}
{/* Ihelp plus subs */}
{/* ihelp magazine */}
{/* Notifications */}
); }; export default AdminCards;
